parse.title: List of monarchies by order of succession

text.*:
World monarchies by succession.
  Absolute primogeniture
  Elective and Agnatic primogeniture
  Agnatic primogeniture
  Elective
  Male-primogeniture
  Agnatic seniority
European monarchies by succession.
  Absolute primogeniture
  Agnatic primogeniture
  Elective
  Male-primogeniture

African monarchies by succession.
  Agnatic primogeniture
  Elective
  Male-primogeniture
Southeast Asian monarchies by succession.
  Absolute primogeniture
  Elective and Agnatic primogeniture
  Agnatic primogeniture
  Elective
  Male-primogeniture

  Elective and Agnatic primogeniture
  Agnatic primogeniture

  Male-primogeniture

This is a list of current monarchies by order of succession (Primogeniture and Elective).

Current monarchies[edit]

Monarchy Head of State Title Mode
 Principality of Andorra [1] Co-Princes Elective
 Antigua and Barbuda[2] Queen Absolute primogeniture
 Commonwealth of Australia[3] Queen
 Commonwealth of the Bahamas[4] Queen
 Barbados[5] Queen
 Kingdom of Bahrain[6] King Agnatic primogeniture
 Kingdom of Belgium[7] King Absolute primogeniture
 Belize[8] Queen
 Kingdom of Bhutan[9] King Male primogeniture
 Brunei Darussalam[10] Sultan Agnatic primogeniture
 Kingdom of Cambodia[11] King Elective and Agnatic primogeniture
 Canada[12] Queen Absolute primogeniture
Kingdom of Denmark[13] Queen
 Grenada[14] Queen
 Jamaica[15] Queen
 Japan[16] Emperor Agnatic primogeniture
 State of Kuwait[17] Emir Elective and Agnatic primogeniture
 Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan[18] King Agnatic primogeniture
 Kingdom of Lesotho[19] King Male primogeniture
 Principality of Liechtenstein[20] Sovereign Prince Agnatic primogeniture
 Grand Duchy of Luxembourg[21] Grand Duke Absolute primogeniture
 Malaysia[22] Yang di-Pertuan Agong Elective
 Principality of Monaco[23] Sovereign Prince Male primogeniture
 Kingdom of Morocco[24] King Agnatic primogeniture
 Kingdom of the Netherlands[25] King Absolute primogeniture
 New Zealand [26] Queen
 Kingdom of Norway[27] King
 Sultanate of Oman[28] Sultan Agnatic primogeniture
 Independent State of Papua New Guinea[29] Queen Absolute primogeniture
 Federation of Saint Kitts and Nevis[30] Queen
 Saint Lucia[31] Queen
 Saint Vincent and the Grenadines[32] Queen
 Kingdom of Saudi Arabia[33] King Agnatic seniority
 Solomon Islands[34] Queen Absolute primogeniture
 Kingdom of Spain[35] King Male primogeniture
 Kingdom of Eswatini[36] King Elective
 Kingdom of Sweden[37] King Absolute primogeniture
 State of Qatar[38] Emir Agnatic primogeniture
 Kingdom of Thailand[39] King Male primogeniture
 Kingdom of Tonga[40] King
 Tuvalu[41] Queen Absolute primogeniture
 United Arab Emirates[42] President Agnatic primogeniture
 United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland[43] Queen Absolute primogeniture
  Vatican City State[44] Pope Elective
